Variable.desc: Image to use for the indicator. Defaults to the Time Machine application icon, obtained as `hs.image.imageFromAppBundle('com.apple.backup.launcher'):setSize({w=16,h=16})`.
Variable.doc: Image to use for the indicator. Defaults to the Time Machine application icon, obtained as `hs.image.imageFromAppBundle('com.apple.backup.launcher'):setSize({w=16,h=16})`.
Variable.name: backupIcon

Variable.desc: Logger object used within the Spoon. Can be accessed to set the default log level for the messages coming from the Spoon.
Variable.doc: Logger object used within the Spoon. Can be accessed to set the default log level for the messages coming from the Spoon.
Variable.name: logger

Variable.desc: Integer specifying how often the indicator should be refreshed. Defaults to 5 seconds.
Variable.doc: Integer specifying how often the indicator should be refreshed. Defaults to 5 seconds.
Variable.name: refresh_interval

desc: Show Time Machine backup progress in a menubar indicator.
doc:
Show Time Machine backup progress in a menubar indicator.

If no backup is in progress, the indicator disappears. When a
backup is in preparation of in progress, the indicator is shown,
indicating current state/progress of the backup.

Download: [https://github.com/Hammerspoon/Spoons/raw/master/Spoons/TimeMachineProgress.spoon.zip](https://github.com/Hammerspoon/Spoons/raw/master/Spoons/TimeMachineProgress.spoon.zip)

items.desc: Image to use for the indicator. Defaults to the Time Machine application icon, obtained as `hs.image.imageFromAppBundle('com.apple.backup.launcher'):setSize({w=16,h=16})`.
items.doc: Image to use for the indicator. Defaults to the Time Machine application icon, obtained as `hs.image.imageFromAppBundle('com.apple.backup.launcher'):setSize({w=16,h=16})`.
items.name: backupIcon

items.desc: Logger object used within the Spoon. Can be accessed to set the default log level for the messages coming from the Spoon.
items.doc: Logger object used within the Spoon. Can be accessed to set the default log level for the messages coming from the Spoon.
items.name: logger

items.desc: Integer specifying how often the indicator should be refreshed. Defaults to 5 seconds.
items.doc: Integer specifying how often the indicator should be refreshed. Defaults to 5 seconds.
items.name: refresh_interval
